description: Harvest fresh tea leaves to prepare them for processing.
Feed tea leaves into the leaf crusher, then deposit them in an oxidizer to produce green or black tea.
Take your processed tea to the blending area to customize the tea to your customer's taste.
With the blend complete, it's time to boil some water and brew the tea.
Serve the finished cup of tea to the customer, and receive a rating based on how well your brew matched their order.
